method.name: Least Mean Square Quadratic classifier

reference.ref: J. S. Rustagi, Optimization Techniques in Statistics. Academic Press, San Diego, 1994.

generalDescription.type: Classification by means of a cuadratic combination fo features.
generalDescription.objective: Classify an instance as a result of a cuadratic combination of its features. The weigths of such combination are fitted as a cuadratic discriminatn using LMS.
generalDescription.howWork:
An instance is classified by means of a linear combination of its features. The method uses the LMS to produce a cuadratic discriminat. An instance is classified with the class that happens to have the better value for the cuadratic combination of its features.
Unknown data induces poorer results.
